Configuration.comment: Specify the type of operation for which this file is meant.

TargetZipLoc.comment: Location of zip file containing exported objects

ExportType.comment: Specify A to export all activities or specific activities. Specify PR to export projects.

ActivityRefId.comment: Specify the activityRefId whose activties need to be exported

ProjectRefId.comment: Specify the projectRefId whose projects need to be exported

ModifiedDate.comment: Specify the date(YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss) along with comparison operator

Projects.comment: List of all Project names that need to be exported

Folders.comment: List of all folders to be exported

Files.comment: List of all files to be exported

Activities.comment: List of all activity types that need to be exported
